customer_name: COLUMBUS AND FRANKLIN COUNTY METRO PARK DIST
site_name: COLUMBUS AND FRANKLIN COUNTY METRO PARK DISTRICT
narrative:
No non-compliant items were identified during this Re-License inspection. 
 
This is a 1st Re-License Inspection for a Class “C” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the park 
manager. The facility is ready to be licensed under the AWA. 
 
A copy of your license will be sent to you without any additional action on your part. If you have not received your license 
within 30 days, please contact the USDA at 970-494-7478. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Amanda Pope, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section
